price: Tidakkah kamu perhatikan orang-orang yang telah menukar nikmat Allah 789 dengan kekafiran dan menjatuhkan kaumnya ke lembah kebinasaan?
arabic: ۞ أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ بَدَّلُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ كُفۡرٗا وَأَحَلُّواْ قَوۡمَهُمۡ دَارَ ٱلۡبَوَارِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna baddalū niʿ'mata al-lahi kuf'ran wa-aḥallū qawmahum dāra al-bawāri
